solution_line_template: The total number of shirts in the donation box is <<{initial_shirts}={total_shirts}>>{total_shirts}.
The total number of pants in the donation box is {initial_shirts} x {pants_multiplier} = <<{initial_shirts}*{pants_multiplier}={total_pants}>>{total_pants}.
The total number of shorts in the donation box is {total_pants} / {shorts_divisor} = <<{total_pants}/{shorts_divisor}={total_shorts}>>{total_shorts}.
The total number of clothes donated is {total_shirts} + {total_pants} + {total_shorts} = <<{total_shirts}+{total_pants}+{total_shorts}={total_clothes}>>{total_clothes} pieces.
